tedrive Steering System GmbH is a specialist development partner and manufacturer of steering systems for the global automotive market. Alongside two plants in Wülfrath, Germany, the company operates production and assembly facilities in Chemnitz and Istanbul. The steering specialist has many years of experience in project planning, development and series-production supply of vehicle components. tedrive operates within a multinational network, working with customers, strategic partners and suppliers in Russia, Turkey, the USA, Argentina, China, Korea and India, as well as further target markets. The product portfolio encompasses steering systems for all vehicle segments – from lightweight steering for e-mobility applications, through iHSA® intelligent hydraulic steering assist for passenger and commercial vehicle rack-and-pinion steering. Following its most recent portfolio expansion, the company also offers the patented iHSA® module as a plug-in solution for recirculating ball steering systems, increasing comfort and road safety for commercial vehicles. This places tedrive well and truly among the innovation drivers and full-service providers in the field of steering technologies.

Founded in Wuppertal, Germany, 85 years ago, STÜKEN is well known as a globally leading supplier for deep drawing products made of metal. STÜKEN products are present in household appliances, armatures, computers, mobile phones and automobiles. Statistically, every automobile on the planet contains 40 STÜKEN components. 

For the production of deep drawn parts, STÜKEN uses transfer presses and progressive dies. These two technologies enable STÜKEN to produce over a thousand different parts in dimensions of less than 1 mm up to max 95 mm with tight tolerances in the µm range. The materials we use include steel, copper, nickel and aluminium alloys such as stainless steel and brass as well as special metals such as molybdenum and niobium.

The material-saving, economical production of deep drawn parts combined with a reliably high precision and quality is one of the reasons why STÜKEN is the supplier of choice for customers around the globe.

STÜKEN is a privately held company with its headquarters in Rinteln, Germany, and over 1,200 employees on three continents. STÜKEN continues to be a family-owned company.

The Deutsche Automobil Treuhand GmbH (DAT) based in Ostfildern near Stuttgart/Germany was founded in February 1931 and is a pan-European operating company for the automotive industry.

Its founders and shareholders are the Association of the Automotive Industry (VDA: Verband der Automobilindustrie), the Association of International Motor Vehicle Manufacturers (VDIK: Verband der Internationalen Kraftfahrzeughersteller) and the German Federation for Motor Trades and Repairs (ZDK: Zentralverband Deutsches Kraftfahrzeuggewerbe).

The core business of DAT is collecting and processing data from OEMs as well as developing and selling a management tool called SilverDAT II, which is a computer information system for repair estimate and used vehicle valuation.  Furthermore DAT offers residual value forecasts and analyzes values for special cars like electric vehicles.

As a basis for their products DAT conducts intensive market research in the automotive sector.  It also offers numerous services via the Internet for customers and businesses in the automotive industry.

The Deutsche Automobil Treuhand GmbH is the world's oldest institution for automotive market research and has always been focusing intensively on the used vehicle market.  DAT also documents the technical vehicle data of all brands.  Thus, information on nearly the entire life cycle of vehicles is available.

DAT Imprint: http://www.dat.de/en/company/imprint.html

Seit 1878 ist die DOLL Fahrzeugbau GmbH ist ein dynamisches Unternehmen aus Oppenau (Schwarzwald), bei dem sich Innovationsstärke, langjährige Erfahrung und anspruchsvolle Technik zu Fahrzeugen von exzellenter Qualität „Made in Germany“ verbinden. Heute ist es als High-tech Spezialist für Transportlösungen fest in seinen Märkten etabliert und fertigt Sonderfahrzeuge für die Bereiche Schwertransport, Holztransport und Flugfeld. Abgerundet wird das Portfolio durch einen umfangreichen After-Sales Service.

Ziel ist es, unsere bisherige Marktposition weiter auszubauen und uns den wachsenden Anforderungen im Trailerbereich zu stellen. Deshalb wurde 2009 die DOLL Sachsen GmbH in Mildenau gegründet, um den Bedürfnissen der osteuropäischen Märkte gerecht zu werden. Ergänzt wird unsere Marktpräsenz durch ein breites Partnernetzwerk, weltweite Vertriebsbüros und ein Joint-Venture in Thailand. 



Experience and know-how all along the line

DOLL Fahrzeugbau GmbH is a dynamic and internationally oriented company combining innovative strength, long-standing expertise and sophisticated technology to produce vehicles of excellent quality “Made in Germany”. Founded in 1878,  the trailer manufacturer has established itself firmly in its markets as the high-tech specialist for transport solutions. Today the extensive business activities are concentrated on the four main business areas Heavy Haulage, Timber Transport, Ground Support Equipment and After-Sales Service. 

Our basic goal is to maintain and extend our leading market position and to face the changing requirements in the trailer sector. For decades IAA has been the most important car fair in the world. Over 1,000 exhibitors and almost 1,000,000 visitors attend the IAA Car show, also known as the Frankfurt Motor Show, each uneven-numbered year. 

The IAA Commercial Vehicles is the largest of its kind with over 2,000 exhibitors and well over 200,000 visitors in Hannover in even-numbered years.

In 1897, eight motor vehicles were exhibited to the public at the Bristol Hotel in Berlin. From these humble beginnings, a regular exhibition was established that, due to its high visitor turnout, had to be separated into an alternating exhibition of passenger cars and commercial vehicles in 1991.

The IAA is organized by the Verband der Automobilindustrie (VDA) e.V. – German Association of the Automotive Industry.

car2go is a mobility service offered by Daimler AG. It is the first carsharing system in the world without fixed rental locations and has set up a new segment: cars can be rented anywhere and at any time for a reasonable price. Vehicles can be located and booked spontaneously via smartphone app or the internet portal. The European locations are operated by the car2go Europe GmbH, the joint venture corporation of Daimler and Europe’s leading car rental company Europcar.

The original idea was developed by Daimler’s Business Innovation Division in 2007. This division identifies business areas of the future which can complement the core business of car manufacture, and develops appropriate business models. 
The first project phase started in October 2008 in the city of Ulm, the city of research and science. The public pilot began in March 2009. Since then, car2go has been a success story, and today it is the generic name for fully flexible car-sharing models, which it pioneered. car2go, the market leader worldwide, is currently located in 30 cities, in nine countries, on three continents. In April 2016 car2go started its first Asian location in Chongqing, a Chinese metropolis of 30 million people. 

Characteristics:
•	Availability: no fixed rental stations, large fleets dispersed over the entire city area 
•	Flexibility: open-end and one-way rentals possible (no additional cost) 
•	Simplicity: fully automated rental process that is easy to understand 
•	Cost transparency: accurate to the minute, no binding contracts, no fixed or monthly 
fees, no minimum rental period
•	Internationality: possibility of the roaming within Europe and within North America

car2go has more than 2,000,000 members worldwide (of whom > 1,100,000 are in Europe and > 560,000 are in Germany); and it has more than 14,200 cars in operation.

As a full-service provider, baier & michels supports you in all fields of fastener technology - technology, production and logistics.

PDR-Team specializes in paintless dent repair (PDR) and offers complete solutions to car dealerships and insurance companies alike. We take care of everything from logistics and repairs acceptance to dealing with the customers' concerns and every step in between.

VIEROL AG – International Automotive Supplier 

This family owned- and operated business based in Oldenburg, Germany was founded in 1977 by Jürgen R Viertelhaus. Since then, the company has grown steadily and has established itself as an international automotive supplier on the market.

With subsidiaries in New Jersey, Shanghai, and Singapore, VIEROL AG maintains important contacts with international business partners. Customers in over 125 countries trust the company’s high quality brands VEMO and VAICO. 

The quality VEMO brand products include a wide range of exclusive automotive electronic parts. The VEMO range currently comprises more than 11,000 items, with sensors and switches, exhaust gas recirculation, and small engines making up our top 3 core product groups. The VAICO range includes more than 19,000 quality spare parts. With the focus on engine air and transmission components, VAICO offers intelligent solutions for automotive repair shops that are perfect alternatives to OEM parts.

As an internationally successful vehicle parts supplier, it is important for us to offer high quality German automotive technology, which is why so many of our components have been awarded the Q+ seal of excellence. The quality seal confirms that these automotive parts made in Germany meet the same quality standards as the original equipment. Q+ products are appreciated around the world for the best quality, precision, and German engineering they represent.

At www.autoteile.de, VIEROL AG offers more than 30,000 electronic and mechanical car parts in our quality VEMO and VAICO brands.

Als Entwicklungsdienstleister hat sich die KET Karosserie Entwicklung Thurner GmbH in über 30 Jahren einen exzellenten Ruf in der Automobilindustrie erarbeitet.
Wer KET sagt, meint fachliche Kompetenz, herausragende Qualität und partnerschaftliches Handeln.
Für diese Werte steht jeder einzelne unserer 300 Mitarbeiter an den Standorten München (Hauptsitz), Sindelfingen, Hamburg, Ingolstadt, Wolfsburg und Graz.



Was uns auszeichnet

Welche Mobilitätskonzepte werden die Menschen in Zukunft bewegen? Wie entwickeln sich die Anforderungen an Ergonomie und Fahrgefühl? Welche Technologien werden unser Verständnis von Fortbewegung revolutionieren?
 Seit 1986 stellen wir uns mit Leidenschaft diesen komplexen Herausforderungen – als Ihr Entwicklungspartner mit dem Schwerpunkt Automotive.
 Vom ersten Konzept bis zur Serienreife begleiten wir Sie bei der Entwicklung von Teilen und Modulen bis hin zum Derivat oder kompletten Fahrzeug. Und geben damit Ihren Visionen eine konkrete Gestalt.

Eine Stärke von KET liegt in der hohen Flexibilität, die wir Ihnen zu jedem Zeitpunkt bieten. Als Familienunternehmen pflegen wir eine besondere Nähe zu unseren Kunden:

Mit mehr als 300 hervorragend ausgebildeten Mitarbeitern sind wir an sechs strategischen Standorten für Sie da – verlassen Sie sich auf modernste Technologien und ein Projektmanagement, das Ihnen den Rücken freihält.

Ein weiterer Vorteil für Sie ist unsere „Partnership for excellence“: Wir fokussieren uns ganz auf das, was wir am besten können, nämlich Design, Konstruktion, Prototypenbau und Projektmanagement. In anderen Bereichen, wie etwa Simulation oder Erprobung, kooperieren wir mit Partnern, die in ihren Bereichen Exzellentes leisten. So können Sie sich darauf verlassen, dass wir unabhängig von eigenen Interessen nur die maximal vorteilhafte Lösung für Sie im Blick haben.

Wir freuen uns, auf Ihre Herausforderungen eine zukunftsweisende Antwort zu finden!

BREMSKERL-REIBBELAGWERKE EMMERLING GmbH & Co. KG is a family owned globally active SME whose head office is in Estorf-Leeseringen, near Nienburg in Germany. With 350 employees globally, 300 of whom work in Germany alone, we develop and manufacture brake and clutch linings for rail vehicles, industrial applications and commercial vehicles.

Together with our worldwide subsidiaries in North America, Great Britain, China and India we are internationally known. Rapid and direct contact to our clientele is particularly important to us here.

In our modern research facilities and laboratory centers we continuously develop new materials for our customers´ special requirements. It is our know-how and the flexibility and great willingness of our workforce that have made us successful for over 80 years as experts for friction lining technology.

Like our company - in accordance with DIN EN ISO 9001:2008 and IRIS - our linings have been frequently tested and certified.

With the most modern automated production facilities we produce a variety of different, state-of-the-art brake and clutch lining variants, which are aligned with regard to shape, size, geometry and dimensions to the individual requirements of our customers.

All production processes are controlled and monitored by our integrated management system.

In addition to all this, we invest continuously in new, modern, efficient systems and machines in order to be able to manufacture brake and clutch linings of the highest quality in future as well with the latest manufacturing technologies.

BALLY WULFF Games & Entertainment GmbH is a leading German company operating in the entertainment electronics segment. The company combines the areas of development, production and sales of cash gaming machines as well as games that can be used on various platforms. 

Product sales are centred on the German market but also on the export business, which is currently focussed on Spain and Italy. The product portfolio of this long-established Berlin-based company includes the very latest cash-gambling machines. Offering impressive contemporary designs, HD animations, touchscreen technology, and fascinating gaming quality, they are the perfect choice for modern entertainment centres and the hospitality sector. An additional core competence is in the development of attractive gaming packages that offer a wide range of entertaining games with exciting special features. Central to all of these ideas is a strong, creative team of developers. 

BALLY WULFF offers products that match the individual needs of the various target groups and locations/fields of application. With a range of exciting and socially controlled recreational products, the company inspires and entertains millions of players – while adhering to comprehensive player protection guidelines. Established in 1950, BALLY WULFF has been part of the SCHMIDT Group in Rhineland Westphalia since 2008. The company operates a network of 12 branch offices throughout Germany and has a workforce of approximately 280 employees.

carexpert gehört mit mehr als 420 Mitarbeitern zu den führenden Kfz- Sachverständigenorganisationen in Deutschland. Auf dem Gebiet der Schadenbegutachtung, der Bewertung und des Schadenmanagements sind wir ein wichtiger Partner für Versicherungen, Leasing-Gesellschaften und Fuhrparkbetreiber.

Die carexpert Sachverständigen GmbH konnte ihren Vorjahreserfolg wiederholen und wurde im März 2014 wieder mit dem Siegel „TOP Arbeitgeber  Mittelstand 2014“ zertifiziert. Hierbei belegte die carexpert den 1. Platz im Gesamtranking im Bereich Mittelstand Deutschland.

Für die Zertifizierung zeichnet das unabhängige Top Employers Institute (vormals CRF Institute) verantwortlich. Die Zertifizierung als Top Arbeitgeber wird nur den weltweit besten Arbeitgebern verliehen: Unternehmen, die sich durch ihre überdurchschnittliche Mitarbeiterorientierung auszeichnen. Bei der Zertifizierung wurden alle wichtigen Bereiche in der Personalpolitik von Unternehmen bewertet. Hierbei hat die carexpert mit 20,5 von 25 möglichen Punkten ein ausgesprochen gutes Ergebnis erzielt.

„Besonders stolz sind wir“, so stellt Geschäftsführer Carsten Maiwald heraus, „dass wir in den Kategorien „Primäre Benefits“ und „Training & Entwicklung“ jeweils den 1. Platz belegt haben.“

Geschäftsführer Carsten Maiwald resümiert: „Gerade als Mittelständler wissen wir, dass unsere Mitarbeiter das Herzstück unseres Unternehmens sind. Nur mit gut ausgebildeten und top motivierten Mitarbeitern wird es uns auch in Zukunft gelingen, die von unseren Kunden gestellten Anforderungen bestmöglich umzusetzen.“

Membran Entertainment Group was established in 1968 and is one of Europe’s most established independents. With our headquarters in Hamburg, Germany, we have offices, subsidiaries, and/or partners in more than 25 global markets. 
 
In 2015, Membran and the Orchard entered into a global strategic partnership. With Membran CEO, Manlio Celotti, at the helm as MD of The Orchard GmbH, Membran now shares in The Orchard’s powerful digital distribution network and cutting edge technical infrastructure.
 
Membran specializes in label services, providing worldwide physical and digital distribution, release planning, strategy and implementation, and sync licensing. We control an own-catalog of over 300.000 musical works and 5.000 active titles, while distributing 16.000 album titles for third-parties, including providing warehousing, manufacturing, and logistics services. 
 
Membran is a one-stop flexible solution geared for today's artists, labels and music market, beyond entertainment.

Ticketmaster is a Live Nation Entertainment, Inc company.

About Live Nation

Live Nation Entertainment is the world’s leading live entertainment and ecommerce company, comprised of four market leaders: Ticketmaster, Live Nation Concerts, Artist Nation and Live Nation Network. Ticketmaster is the global event ticketing leader and one of the world’s top five ecommerce sites, with a database of over 119 million fans who visit our sites. Live Nation Concerts produces 22,000 shows annually for more than 2,300 artists globally. Artist Nation is the world’s top artist management company, representing over 200 artists. These businesses power Live Nation Network, the leading provider of entertainment marketing solutions, enabling nearly 800 advertisers to tap into the 250 million consumers Live Nation delivers annually through its live event and digital platforms. In Germany, Ticketmaster GmbH has more than 60 employees in the Berlin headquarters and offices in Hamburg, Munich and Frankfurt.

For additional information, visit www.livenation.com/investors.

The Experts for Salt Cores used in Piston Manufacturing and other Casting Components

Established in 1921 as a metal packaging manufacturer, Emil Müller GmbH began manufacturing stamping and bending parts, garnering the company a permanent position the automotive industry in the years thereafter. The company headquarters in Wilhermsdorf has been manufacturing salt cores exclusively for piston manufacturing for over 25 years now along with other casting components such as engine blocks and oil pans.  Emil Müller GmbH has been a 100% subsidiary of the CeramTec Group since 2007.
specialities: Salt cores used in piston manufacturing and other casting components

ASAM (Association for Standardization of Automation and Measuring Systems) coordinates the development of technical standards in the automotive industry. The standard portfolio ranges from Calibration, Measurement, Diagnostics and Networks of ECUs to Software Development to Test Automation to Data Management and Analysis. The standards are developed by experts from ASAM member companies. Members are international OEMs, Tier-1 suppliers, tool vendors and universities. It is estimated that approx. 80% of all cars worldwide are using ASAM technology and that a great number of OEMs apply ASAM standards in their processes.  To learn more about ASAM, visit www.asam.net

Die H.T.P. Motorsport GmbH wurde im Jahr 2012 als Nachfolger der Heico Motorsport GmbH gegründet. H.T.P war seit Beginn des GT-Engagements von Heico als Partner und Förderer mit in das GT3 Projekt eingebunden.

Die sportliche Leitung der personell unveränderten Mannschaft der GT-Sparte hat weiterhin Norbert Brückner, Entdecker und Förderer des DTM-Rekordchampions Bernd Schneider, inne. Norbert Brückner besitzt jahrzehntelange Erfahrung im Kart-, Formel- und Tourenwagensport. Er ist unbestritten eine der führenden Persönlichkeiten im deutschen und europäischen Motorsport was die Gebiete Fahrerscouting und – entwicklung betrifft. Sein Wissen und sein Know-how werden auf und neben der Rennstrecke von allen Teams, Fahrern und Motorsportinteressierten anerkannt und geschätzt.

Heico Motorsport engagierte sich seit 2011 unter der sportlichen Leitung von Norbert Brückner in verschiedenen nationalen und internationalen GT-Rennserien.

H.T.P. Motorsport knüpfte nahtlos an die Erfolge von Heico an und erreichte in 2013 das absolute Top-Level im GT3 Sport.

Das Unternehmen
Die CCUnirent System GmbH mit Sitz in Nürnberg ist einer der großen Systemgeber in der Branche der Autovermietunternehmen. Das Unternehmen bietet seine  Serviceleistungen in drei wichtigen Geschäftsbereichen an: zum einen als Dienstleister (Automobilhersteller mit Interesse am Aufbau eines Vermietsystems unter der eigenen Herstellermarke), zum anderen als Franchisegeber (Fokus auf mittelständische Autovermieter) sowie als Kooperationspartner. Als Franchisegeber werden zwei verschiedene Partnerschaftsmodelle angeboten: eine Zusammenarbeit als Systempartner mit Markennutzungsrecht der Marke „CC Rent a car“ oder als Systempartner ohne Markennutzungsrecht.

Über 800 angeschlossene Vermietstationen nutzen sowohl die Systeme und Dienstleistungen für Mobilität, als auch die branchenrelevante Beratung der CCUnirent. Die Systempartner platzieren jährlich gemeinsam ein Einkaufsvolumen von 20.000 Fahrzeugen bei deutschen Automobilherstellern und Fahrzeugimporteuren.

Als erfahrener Systemdienstleister ist auch ein professioneller Aufbau und Betrieb von
In-house Vermietsystemen durch die CCUnirent möglich. Die CCUnirent System GmbH
betreibt als Operator Autovermietsysteme und Mobilitätsmarken für mehrere Fahrzeugimporteure und deren Handelsorganisationen.

The modern day premises of Stoof International are located on the outskirts of the German capital Berlin in a town called Borkheide. Stoof International has a growing workforce of 140 employees, a dedicated team of craftsman and specialists. And together with this workforce Stoof’s philosophy is to provide each customer with the expertise and innovation needed to incorporate their special requirements into a unique product.

Armoured vehicles are by nature built and distributed to a worldwide international market. End-users and prospective clients are located in different time zones and have diverse customs. Stoof International has moved on with the experience it has gained in fast moving security environment and adheres to the modern day methods and trends of global business regarding supply and demand.

In the face of growing overseas competition Stoof International has established itself as an organisation that provides quality from the off set based upon traditional German automotive technology and know-how. Reliability and trust in the merchandise have a serious emphasis to the users of Stoof International’s products. And in many instances no news is good news when it comes to customer feedback.

Stoof International has moved forward with the modern day security requirements building discreet armoured vehicles to meet the present day threats. The company policy will be to continue to progress and improve and hold the poll position within the automotive security industry.

Through our offices in Wolfsburg, Osnabrück, Regensburg, Ingolstadt and Reutlingen, we have excellent contacts with key customers and so always stay up to date. 


We design, develop and industrialize for our customers’ innovative concepts and solutions for the next generation of vehicles.  With our highly motivated and creative team, we check ground-breaking ideas for practical feasibility, put the ideas into working prototypes and support the products up to their production. 


For this reason, we count among our employees, experts with years of experience, who again and again upgrade their skills in their specialist field.  We want to please our customers not only with our motivation, creativity and imagination, but also with our flexibility and customer proximity. 


We at DELVIS GmbH try to find the best solution path for you and your requirements.  We support you from day one.
